title: Exploring porous structures without crystals: advancements with pair distribution function in metal- and covalent organic frameworks
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00267A, Review Article
Open Access

Ignacio Romero-Muñiz, Edward Loukopoulos, Ying Xiong, Félix Zamora, Ana E. Platero-Prats
This review highlights the importance of pair distribution function (PDF) analysis in revealing molecular interactions, structural transformations, and nucleation mechanisms in metal- and covalent organic frameworks (MOFs and COFs).
